Author: kls
Content:
Honestly I think the dynamics of the movie are lost on any generation that was not in the work force at that time. In that period, outside of the valley, a good deal of people would end up working at a Innotec, at some point in their life and it is a soul sucking experience. Working with the mundane individuals who have learned how to work the corporate system but produce nothing can really kill motivation. Further dealing with people who are in charge of decision making, but are obviously incompetent can create a Peter.

Office Space was not about a lazy guy, it was commentary, at the time, about how the faceless enterprise software shop can burn a person out, at it&

Author: alooPotato
Title: Streak.com is hiring Sales Representatives
Content:
We’re looking for a motivated, team player to join our startup as one of our first Sales Representatives.

You will be responsible for taking prospects through the entire sales process from sourcing & handling inbound leads, assisting through trials, showing demos, and of course CLOSING! Being one of the first sales reps at a small, fast-growing startup, you’ll have the opportunity to learn a ton about the sales role and growing a sales team.

Responsibilities handle incoming leads through our website nurture leads through trial periods navigate through existing install base for upgrade/upsell opportunities qualify and convert inbound leads (via website, referrals, etc) develop prospecting strategies to generate new business opportunities research existing customer base of free users and identify candidates for upgrade analyze and implement changes to improve the existing sales process provide product recommendations to the Product/Engineering teams (driven by data and customer feedback)

BACKGROUND 1-2 years experience in outbound/inbound sales Undergraduate degree Superior written and verbal communication skills (99% of interactions will happen via email and phone) Confident and well-spoken when speaking with C-Level, Co-Founders, and other executive at startups and small/medium-sized companies Extremely organized and analytical SQL knowledge is a plus

WHY US? New Macbook or Windows laptop Health benefits for you and your dependent(s) Free snacks, breakfast, and lunch (and sometimes dinner) $200/month Flex account (Uber, Lyft, Taskrabbit - basically anything that saves you time and/or makes you more productive in life and work!)

Let&

Author: nsnick
Content: When I visit a site, I want to see content from that site. I did not consent to view ads from a third party. I would be happy to view ads that a site decides to host and display. The problem is that most sites have absolutely no idea what ads they are displaying. They just want money. It is probably not even feasible to block ads that a site hosts themselves.
